item.title: Version 0.1.1 (alpha)
item.description:
Features:

  • integrated Sparkle framework for In-App updates
    •

    Bugfixes:

  • fixed crash upon pressing "End conversation" button
  • fixed stream selection bug: sometimes, selected stream was locked without allowing switches to another streams
    •

item.title: Version 0.1.0 (alpha)
item.description: Requirements: - MacOS X 10.9 or later - NFD or ndnd-tlv forwarder installed Features: - audio/video streams publishing - audio/video streams fetching - user list - user meta info fetching - current fetching statistics - publishing from any camera recognized by MacOS - publishing in several encoding rates simultaneously
